nodes.text: Martyr's Plaza was a plaza, that was built by the Nazren and located in Ahdjok, on Nizon.

A 9-meter wide ornate stone dome was constructed in the center of the plaza and three large statues of ancient martyred heroes of the Nazren surrounded it. When the Galactic Empire came to Nizon, they set up three defensive turrets between the statues and the plaza became the sight of some fighting during the Battle of Nizon, when the Nazren rose up against the Empire.
